job_title: Software Engineer, Security Product and Platform
job_description:
• The focus will be on improving developer and research tooling and productivity, while also delivering the robust functionality and controls required by IT and Security.
• Design and implement new features for existing security tools to enhance functionality and user experience.
• Experience designing and developing secure software solutions and infrastructure components.
• Experience with security practices such as threat models, risk assessment, and security protocols.
• Detection Infrastructure: You will work on protecting the company’s data and infrastructure from emerging threats that are critical to OpenAI.
• In addition to preventative measures, you’ll also be responsible for enhancing our detective and corrective controls and partner with teams within Security and broader OpenAI.
• Identity Systems: You’ll be eager to work on identity and access management solutions that will significantly impact our engineering and research stack.
• Infrastructure Security: You will focus on building products and practices that scale to a global footprint.

• Data analysis or software skills: Python, MATLAB, JavaScript/Typescript Strong background in numerical computing or statisticsFamiliarity with high density data storage formats such as parquet, HDF5 and netCDFBackground in data classification or clusteringYou see complex systems as puzzles waiting to be solved and thrive in environments where innovation meets precisionPrior internship or hands-on project experience in aerospace, defense, or related high-tech industriesDemonstrates a strong work ethic and ambition, complemented by effective collaboration skills in a team settingExcels in a high-energy, independent, and challenging work environment Experience with systems programming languages, particularly Rust or GoPast experience working with data extracted from REST endpoints, or other web based data access technologiesCollaborative track record in a diverse technical domains – from aerospace, biological science, engineering, or medicine, you've teamed up with experts to get the answers to deep technical questions Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (graduating in Spring 2026).

job_title: Cloud Solution Architect – Software, Developer Tools & AI
job_description: Join Microsoft to empower every person and organization on the planet.
Join PayPal to democratize financial services.
